title: Shay Mitchell gives birth to her first child as she welcomes baby girl with boyfriend Matte Babel
text:
Shay Mitchell and longtime beau Matte Babel announced on Sunday that their little bundle of joy, a baby daughter, had arrived.

The 32-year-old Pretty Little Liars star announced the news with a photo of herself holding the little girl's tiny hand.

She accompanied the precious photo with the caption: 'Never letting go ...'

She's here: Shay Mitchell and longtime beau Matte Babel announced on Sunday that their little bundle of joy, a baby daughter, had arrived

Mitchell announced their pregnancy with a topless maternity snapshot that featured the following caption in jest: 'Does this mean I’m allowed to drive in the carpool lane at all times now?'

She also made a two-minute announcement video that included in its description: 'There is something in the oven and it’s not my pizza!!! WOW … It’s kind of surreal processing the fact that another human is growing inside of you.'

Following the announcement, Babel gave his lady love props in the form of an Instagram post, stating in the caption: 'The strength, vulnerability and grace you’ve had during this pregnancy has left me in awe, you’re going to be an incredible mom. We’re lucky to have you, love you.'

Coupled: Mitchell and Babel have been linked since 2017

Back in July, the couple revealed the gender of their baby girl in an unconventional way by posting a YouTube video that featured a blue and pink Power Ranger play-fighting until the pink ranger came out as the winner.

The baby's arrival comes after Mitchell revealed in January that she'd had a miscarriage last year.

'Although it was an amazing year, it didn’t come without some hardships,' she wrote in an Instagram Story post of an ultrasound alongside a broken heart emoji.

LOL: Back in July, the couple revealed the gender of their baby girl in an unconventional way by posting a YouTube video that featured a blue and pink Power Ranger play-fighting until the pink ranger came out as the winner

Mitchell elaborated on the ordeal on the July premiere of her YouTube series Almost Ready, saying that she was 'completely blindsided' by the miscarriage.

'I know other women and other friends of mine who’ve gone through a way harder journey,' she said.

'It’s just really tough because you feel broken, as a woman, and that’s not a great feeling.'

Mitchell and Babel have been linked since 2017.
description: Shay Mitchell  and longtime beau Matte Babel announced on Sunday that their little bundle of joy, a baby daughter, had arrived.
